esema wasara 5k watup rahithawa saudiye sewaya kala marimuththu rajamalar menewiyata hi`ga watup lesa ru. 1,527,933.75 ka mudalak 2017.10.27 wana dina labadena ladi. 2016 warshayedi wigamanika shramikayin 51 deneku sandaha ru.24,834,526.84k (dekoti hathalis ata laksha this hathara dahas pansiya wisi hayayi shatha asu hatharak) hinga watup washayen labadena ladi. 2015 wasare widesha rakiya amathyawariya lesa thalatha athukorala mahathmiya rajakari aarambha kirimen anathuruwa mese widesha ratawala asaranawi siti kanthawan rasak diwayinata genwa gatha hakiwuni.

namuth sakariyiya sahib wisin sandahan kara athi siddhiye uththamawarayage pranaya jiwaya athpath kara gath malaikawarun dedena sarwa baladhari allahge niyamaya wana 'illiyin' namathi pothe eya sandahan kirimata sarasena wita wenath malakwarayeku pamina 'mawu kuse sitina wita wasanawanthayeku yayi liyana laddangen mohu da keneki' ema nisa an aya se mohuwa sandahan kirima anawashya karyayak yayi pawasa sarwa baladhari allahge niyamayata wiruddha wa malaikawarun kriya kala bawa sandahan kara atha.
